main.name: Doctor Single Track
main.description: Developing non standard processing for patient care
main.subDescription: What mutual between riding on unknown single track by mountain bike and the way of the medical treatment of the patient? First of all in both cases you are alone. Next you don’t know the end of the journey . Each round can be unexpected. The patient like mountain biker can be prepared to any surprise. No one can be ensured from fall. Rider like patient have to know to stand again , remove the dust and to continue forward to the target
main.bio: Our technology intended for any medical patient process consist of several stage of treatment. In general, in medical treatment engaged several medical organizations. In most cases the integration between them not very effective. And patient can lost most important  resource – the time. In serious diseases the time is crucial factor. Sometimes the lost time differ between life and death. The technology helps solve the problem of integration. And as result improve successive  results of patient health care.

projects.title: Silverbyte, Property Management System

itemsproject.title: Build WEB API SERVICES for hotel management of: PRICE OF THE ROOM , YIELD BY DATES, AVAILIBILITY, CALENDAR OF RESERVARTIONS, MAINTAINACE OF THE ROOM IN HOTEL, INVENTORY

projects.projectDescription: Developing Hotel Property Management System. The system used for reservation, availability and occupancy management, check-in/out, images, guest profiles, report generation etc. This application is used in-house (in an individual hotel) to control the onsite property activities.The system is installed in 90% of Israel hotels. As also in hotel of Germany,Holland,UK and others countires

projects.title: Silverbyte, Property Management System - GUI

itemsproject.title: Build different GUI for update of inventory Hotel Property Management System

projects.projectDescription: Developing client side GUI. Using of self developed controls and exsiting javascript libraries: kendo, semantic ui react, devextreme  reactive

projects.title: Silverbyte, Hotel Data Transfer

itemsproject.title: Build server side algorithms, for example room price on specific dates depends on diffirent paramers like availibility, yield, occupancy, maitainace

projects.projectDescription: Developing a tool that will allow you to sell all your rooms on all your connected booking sites (like Booking.com ,Expedia, AirBNB ) at the same time. It will automatically update your availability in real-time on all sites when a booking is made, when you close a room to sale, or when you want to make bulk changes to your inventory

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
